unit.name: Pz Bde 150 HQ
unit.History: Panzer Brigade 150 was comprised of 2 tank groups and 1 infantry combat group. With a makeshift assortment of American vehicles, equipment and crude mock-ups of American tanks, the brigade was to be the armed fist of Operation "Greif"

commander.Name: Otto Skorzeny
commander.PersBio: Skorzeny was born in Vienna on June 12, 1908. In 1931 Skorzeny joined the Austrian Nazi Party and soon became a member of the Nazi SA. After fighting on the Eastern Front with the 2nd SS Panzer Division, he commanded the rescue mission that freed Benito Mussolini from captivity on September 12, 1943. Skorzeny died of cancer in 1975.
commander.Title: CO

estab.Name: BB - 150 - Pz V Coy / KG X
BB - 150 - StuG III Coy / KG Y
